DOC.brief_title: Tipifarnib Plus Trastuzumab Treating Patients With Metastatic Breast Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Determine antitumor activity tipifarnib trastuzumab ( Herceptin ) patient metastatic breast cancer . - Determine safety tolerability regimen patient . OUTLINE : This open-label , multicenter study . Patients receive oral tipifarnib twice daily day 1-21 trastuzumab ( Herceptin ) IV 30-90 minute day 1 . Courses repeat every 4 week absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients follow every 2 month . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 18-40 patient accrue study within 9-20 month .
